meta.article_title: April 4, 2011 - What is the Goal of the Receiver?

what-is-the-goal-of-the-receiver.probleme: What is the Goal of the Receiver?

debutant.description: Play aggressive, take the initiative, and try to dominate the point.
Force the opponent into a mistake or a weak attack, or catch them so off guard they can't attack at all.

exercices_complementaires.description: Play aggressively and take the initiative. Examples include a short serve that pops up slightly, a serve that goes long that the receiver is ready for (and should usually loop), and serves where the receiver reads the serve well early on and is comfortable attacking.
Loop most short serves that don't have backspin. Constantly vary your receive so your opponent never knows what you're going to do next.

metriques_progression.target: Take the initiative and put pressure on the server
